org.mfg.mdb.runtime

Interface IAppender<T extends IRecord>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generated record type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Demo_02_PriceMDB.Appender

    public interface IAppender<T extends IRecord>
    Common interface for all the appenders.
    Author:
    arian

      • append_ref_unsafe

        void append_ref_unsafe(T record)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Add to the file the given record. Warning, the same record instance is inserted in the memory buffer, do not modify it after this operation. Just use this method if you know what are you doing.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to append.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is any problem writing the file.

      • toRecord

        T toRecord()
        Create a record with the appender's values.
        Returns:
        The record.
